name: forest
story: What did I do yesterday? Where am I?... Oh... A forest. How can I go out?... I need to find Inca's gold!
nav: press 1 to go to wakanda, press 2 to go to howarts, press 3 to go to narnia

name: wakanda
story: Wakanda? How?... I need some vibranium…. Ok, done, I need to leave, it's boiling.
nav: press 1 to go to forest, press 2 to go to madrid, press 3 to go to new york

name: howarts
story: My dream came true, I'm in Hogwarts… Where is Harry Potter?... I think he isn't here… I should better go
nav: press 1 to go to haunted house, press 2 to go to disnelyand, press 3 to go to howarts

name: narnia
story: This place is fantastic!... I see the lion! What beautiful creatures, but it's freezing!
nav: press 1 to go to statue of liberty, press 2 to go to london, press 3 to go to madrid

name: haunted house
story: It's in a haunted house, it is very scary… Anyway, let's go!... Or... I better leave…
nav: press 1 to go to forest, press 2 to go to new york, press 3 to go to galapagos islands

name: madrid
story: I'm starving… let's eat a paella!
nav: press 1 to go to disnelyand, press 2 to go to london, press 3 to go to niagara falls

name: london
story: I should visit the queen… I'll call her
nav: press 1 to go to volcano, press 2 to go to wakanda, press 3 to go to new york

name: new york
story: These buildings are too high!... I love the empire state
nav: press 1 to go to galapagos islands, press 2 to go to howarts, press 3 to go to statue of liberty

name: statue of liberty
story: It was always my dream… The view from here is fantastic! …
nav: press 1 to go to disnelyand, press 2 to go to mount everest, press 3 to go to forest

name: disneyland
story: I have a fast pass! I'll enjoy this park! …Ok… that was enough. I need to continue my journey.
nav: press 1 to go to new york, press 2 to go to niagara falls, press 3 to go to toronto

name: mount everest
story: It's freezing!... I'm tired!... Why did I come here?...
nav: press 1 to go to cancun, press 2 to go to narnia, press 3 to go to volcano

name: volcano
story: There are some active volcanoes, I'll be careful not to step on them…
nav: press 1 to go to madrid, press 2 to go to vancouver, press 3 to go to galapagos islands

name: galapagos islands
story: I'll enjoy the fresh waters, it is a good place to relax… but I want to go back home, my cat is alone…
nav: press 1 to go to mount everest, press 2 to go to great wall, press 3 to go to haunted house

name: cancun
story: It's terribly hot here, let's go to the beach… but a storm is coming..
nav: press 1 to go to niagara falls, press 2 to go to vancouver, press 3 to go to london

name: niagara falls
story: Finally! Niagara falls! I'd love to swim…. Ok, better no…
nav: press 1 to go to wakanda, press 2 to go to toronto, press 3 to go to new york

name: great wall
story: What people say it's true! This walls are amazing but too long for me… I'm tired…
nav: press 1 to go to cancun, press 2 to go to niagara falls, press 3 to go to vancouver

name: vancouver
story: The Pacific Ocean? …Amazing! But too much rain! I should get out of here…
nav: press 1 to go to sudbury, press 2 to go to narnia, press 3 to go to volcano

name: toronto
story: What beautiful is the CN tower! Nice city but too expensive…
nav: press 1 to go to cambrian college, press 2 to go to great wall, press 3 to go to toronto

name: sudbury
story: All those lakes!... The peace you feel here is incredible!... But… I need to continue my journey
nav: press 1 to go to london, press 2 to go to space station, press 3 to go to cambrian college

name: cambrian college
story: Oh yes… my college!... I'll visit the classrooms… okay… too much homework, I better go.
nav: press 1 to go to niagara falls, press 2 to go to great wall, press 3 to go to lima

name: lima
story: This is a very busy city, I hate the traffic…but it's beautiful
nav: press 1 to go to machu picchu, press 2 to go to toronto

name: space station
story: Oh no… a rocket is exploding near me… I think I'm going to die… bye...game over

name: machu picchu
story: What a magical place!... I'll stay here forever… Here is the gold!… I win!
